item.title: Overview of Graph Developer Proxy
item.author: Kunj Sangani
item.description: Introduction Graph Developer Proxy is a tool that simulates API errors using the command line. This tool works for the Microsoft Graph API but can also be extended for other APIs as well. This tool can help applications catch API errors and handle them gracefully. This tool will even help mock the API response so that we do not need to hit the server while we are developing our application.
